mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Letter from Helen O'Bannon to Richard Thornburgh on Pennhurst Mandate

mods:name.mods:namePart: Detre Library & Archives, Heinz History Center

mods:mods.mods:abstract: A letter from Secretary Helen O'Bannon to Governor Richard Thornburgh regarding the actions the Department of Public Welfare is currently taking to comply with the court mandate of the previous year. O'Bannon assures Thornburgh that the process will accelerate soon.

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Bob Nelkin Collection of ACC-PARC Records

mods:relatedItem.mods:note: II. State School and Hospital (SSH) and Interim Care Committee Records 1972-1997
Bob Nelkin Collection of ACC-PARC Records, 1953-2000, MSS 1002 , Detre Library and Archives, Senator John Heinz History Center
